entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Wrigley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:43 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wrigley Airport 1:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -18.9°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -21.1°C
Wind: SE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow except snow at times heavy over northern sections. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over northern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 17.
